name: DOKI DOKI CONNECTION
description:
Game made for the LOVE Jam 2023, made with Lua and LOVE by Steve 'Gawdahm' Wheeler and Sandra Lundh over an accumulated period of about 12 hours.

All code and assets are made by us for the jam. DALL-E was used to generate the running businessman, the cat/dog sprites, and the bus sprite, with retouching done by us.

Play on Firefox or Chrome for best experience (Safari messes up the timing)

HOW TO PLAY

All mini-games are controlled by moving the mouse of left-clicking with the mouse. Try to complete as many mini-games as possible before losing 3 lives.

Good luck!
